titleStmt.title: Examen legum Angliæ, or, The laws of England examined, by Scripture, antiquity and reason cujus author anagrammat[os] est, A gomoz boa oz̄ bary.
titleStmt.author: Booth, A., 17th cent.
Boon, A.

notesStmt.note: Attributed to Booth by Wing and NUC pre-1956 imprint; also variously attributed to A. Boon, cf. Halkett & Laing and BM.
Bracketed letters, and last sentence, in author statement are printed in Greek characters.
Reproduction of the original in the Cambridge University Library.
